post: As I have said before, I am not a scientist. But I think that common sense should tell us that the Shroud would have pollen on it from where ever it had been kept, open up, laid down, folded up etc. For it’s about 2,000 year history, Some of it may even have dirty smudges from hands, or what ever it was laid down on and/or stored on or in. The Shroud is the Lords present to us, we must honor it and take care of it..
